ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by the Slovak Research and Development Agency under the contract No. APVV-15-0710. This work was supported by the Science Grant Agency-project 1/0346/19. This work was also supported by the Research Agency of the Ministry of Education, Science, Research and Sport of the Slovak Republic under the contract (ITMS2014+) no. 313011W442-CEDITEK II.
